name: 25th international literature festival berlin
description: The 25th edition of the ilb celebrates a quarter century of world literature with over 130 authors from 40 countries. This year's theme is 'GLOW', exploring the dual nature of lightâ€”illumination and shadow. The programme includes book premieres, panel discussions, a poetry night, and special anniversary events featuring Nobel Prize winners. Curator in Residence is Pulitzer Prize winner Cristina Rivera Garza.
